title: An Ex-Trump Adviser’s Acquittal Shows How Politics and Business Intertwine
description: The acquittal of Thomas J. Barrack Jr., a former Trump adviser, showed the difficulty of proving wrongdoing amid a brew of political, personal and commercial interests.
dc:creator: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
media:description: Thomas J. Barrack Jr. helped the Emirati government get its message heard by the right people in Washington.
